data.title: Lake George Adventure Park
data.meta_description: The Adirondack Extreme Treetop Adventure Park is an Aerial Adventure and Zip Line Park in Bolton Landing New York. Tree Top Adventure Courses in Lake George feature: Zip lines, suspended bridges, swings, slides, nets and an aerial surf board.
data.text:
Adirondack Extreme Adventure Course is the Lake George Area's destination for family fun offering four Kids Courses, six adult courses, and low-rider zipline only tour. We offer the only exclusively zipline course in the Lake George Region.

Explore the beauty of the Great Adirondack Forest as you traverse through the Adirondack Extreme treetop obstacle adventure course and zipline park and reach heights most will only dream of. Established in 2007, Adirondack Extreme Adventure Course was the first aerial adventure course to open in the United States. Others have tried to imitate, but none can duplicate the experience of trekking tree-to-tree on our aerial obstacles within the trees of the beautiful Adirondack Forest.

If you're new to our park we suggest that you review each of our adventure course and zipline options to see which ones meet your adventure level. All of our courses have a minimum age requirement and all but our kids' courses will have a reach requirement.

For our customers who prefer to speak with one of our Tree-Top specialists, we're just a phone call away.

Whichever level of adventure you decide, reservations are strongly recommended to allow us to make your adventure “extremely” fun. Same-day reservations may be available but are not guaranteed. Check availability and book your preferred climb time to avoid disappointment.

Adventure Courses 1-4 - Ages 9+ - $55

75 treetop obstacles and 20 ziplines

Experience the first 4 of our 6 adventure courses. Tarzan swings, punching bags, the rib cage, chop-stix, logos, and the long zipline over alder brook are just a few of the elements you will encounter.

Looking for MORE treetop fun? Upgrading to our 5th & 6th courses gets you an additional 30 obstacles & 3 more ziplines.

Fifth Course - Ages 10+ - $5

Sixth Course - Ages 12+ - $5

Low Rider Zipline Course - Ages 9+ $15

Reach Requirement: Measured feet flat and arms raised above your head, your fingertips should reach the height of 5' 9"

An adult 18 or older must complete a waiver for adventurers aged 9-17

Adventures ages 9-12 must be accompanied by someone 18 or older on the course

find out more

"Low Rider" Zip Tour - Ages 9+ - $50

Our “Low Rider" Zipline Tour,” is an introductory zipline course designed for first-time, novice zipline adventurers as well as seasoned obstacle course veterans consisting of 12 ziplines and 9 walking bridges. The difference between our zipline-only course and other traditional zip tours is its proximity to the ground. Each of the "Low Rider" ziplines are 75 to 550 feet in length, and range in heights of 10-30 feet above the lush forest floor and naturally occurring, picturesque landscape features such as Alder Brook.

Zipliners may repeat this tour 2x per ticket

Customize the intensity of your adventure by adding adventure courses.

Add on our first 2 Adventure Courses - Ages 9+ - $10

Reach Requirement: Measured feet flat and arms raised above your head, your fingertips should reach the height of 5' 9"

An adult 18 or older must complete a waiver for adventurers aged 9-17

Adventures ages 9-12 must be accompanied by someone 18 or older on the course (ratio 1:5)

find out more

Adventure Courses 1 & 2 + Low Rider Zip Tour Combo - Ages 9+ - $55

30 obstacles and 17 ziplines

3+ Hours of Aerial Adventure- includes our first two adventure courses, our fan-favorite 550 foot tandem giant ziplines, and our brand new Low Rider Zip Tour!

Get the best of both worlds with our Adventure Courses & Low Rider Zip Tour Combo (ages 9+), which offers 40 obstacles and 17 ziplines on our first two treetop adventure courses (easy to moderate in difficulty) and the brand new Low Rider Zip Tour (an introductory zipline course designed for first-time, novice zipline adventurers as well as seasoned obstacle course veterans).

Customize the intensity of your adventure by adding additional courses on the day of your climb.

Third Course - Ages 9+ - $5

Fourth Course - Ages 9+ - $5

Fifth Course - Ages 10+ - $5

Sixth Course - Ages 12+ - $5

Reach Requirement: Measured feet flat and arms raised above your head, your fingertips should reach the height of 5' 9" (Combo & Courses 3 & 4) and 5' 11" (Courses 5 & 6)

Weight & Waist restrictions: Participants must weigh less than 310 pounds and fit into a 42-inch waist harness.

An adult 18 or older must complete a waiver for adventurers aged 9-17

Adventures ages 9-12 must be accompanied by someone 18 or older on the course

find out more
